<h1 align="center">
  Marvel React UI
</h1>

This project aims to retrieve information on specific marvel characters in the comics lore. Each selected character will return comic issues in which he is the titular hero. Clicking on each title will enable you to get detailed information on that specific issue

_Presented by Mokhtari Youssef El-Moukhtar_
